dublin_core.dcvalue: The aim of this review was to investigate to what extent information technology may support self management among service users with psychotic disorders The investigation aimed to answer the following questions What types of e mental health self management interventions have been developed and evaluated What is the current evidence on clinical outcome and cost effectiveness of the identified interventions To what extent are e mental health self management interventions oriented toward the service user
E-mental health self-management for psychotic disorders: state of the art and future perspectives.
